landingPage.heroSubHeadline1: Capture precious moments and milestones with simplicity.
landingPage.heroSubHeadline2: LilleLogg makes it easy to stay on top of your baby's growth.
landingPage.appPreviewAlt: Lillelogg App Preview on a Phone Mockup
landingPage.feature1Description: Never miss a precious moment with easy milestone tracking and reminders
landingPage.feature2Description: Monitor your baby's development with clear, insightful charts and data
landingPage.feature3Description: Share access with caregivers and family members for seamless coordination
